item.title: Learn User Experience Design from A-Z: Adobe XD UI/UX Design
item.description: Welcome to the Learn User Experience Design from A-Z: Adobe XD UI UX Design Where youâ€™re going to learn how to get started with User Experience and User Interface Design (UX/UI) Design and how to land your first job as a UX Designer even if you have no prior knowledge or experience. In this practical, hands-on course our main objective is to give you the education not just to understand the ins and outs of UX and UI Design, but also to learn exactly how the web development industry works, the different roles within a team, how color psychology and color schemes work , so you can learn first hand exactly how to design websites and mobile apps in Adobe XD and create an amazing user experience as a UX & UI Designer.
